Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures.properties

Class PropertyContainerSerializer

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures.properties.PropertyContainerSerializer
public final class PropertyContainerSerializer extends Object
Serializes and deserializes PropertyContainer instances to and from JSON.
